org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data

注释类型 ConditionalOnRepositoryType


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
 @Documented
 @Conditional(value=org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data.OnRepositoryTypeCondition.class)
public @interface ConditionalOnRepositoryType
    Conditional that only matches when a particular type of Spring Data repository has been enabled.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0

    • 必需元素概要

      所需元素 
      限定符和类型 必需的元素和说明
      String store
      The name of the store that backs the repositories.
      RepositoryType type
      The required repository type.

    • 元素详细资料

      • store

        public abstract String store
        The name of the store that backs the repositories.
        返回:
        the store

      • type

        public abstract RepositoryType type
        The required repository type.
        返回:
        the required repository type
